extension_description.message: Automatically changes zoom level to fit window width. With three different zooming modes.

browserActions_offBadge.description: Short text that appears above extension icon indicating that it is disabled. Four characters long tops.

options_mainTitle.description: Title that appears on top of options page and on window title itself

options_refreshWarning.message: (currently opened pages must be reloaded for the changes to take effect)
options_refreshWarning.description: Warn user that he/she must refresh page after saving options

options_zoomMode_shrinkOnly.description: Shrink Only zoom mode option name

options_zoomMode_growOnly.description: Grow Only zoom mode option name

options_zoomMode_shrinkAndGrow.description: Shrink And Grow zoom mode option name

options_zoomMode_shrinkOnlyExplanation.message: Zoom is always at 100% unless window width is decreased and the contents are shrinked to fit, avoiding horizontal scrollbar.
options_zoomMode_shrinkOnlyExplanation.description: Shrink Only zoom mode option explanation

options_zoomMode_growOnlyExplanation.message: Zoom level is never lower than 100% and it only grows for the contents to fit window width.
options_zoomMode_growOnlyExplanation.description: Grow Only zoom mode option explanation

options_zoomMode_shrinkAndGrowExplanatio.message: Contents are shrinked and growed to fit window width.
options_zoomMode_shrinkAndGrowExplanatio.description: Shrink And Grow zoom mode option explanation

options_maxZoomAllowed_percentageExplana.message: Value used by Grow Only and Shrink And Grow modes to calculate the maximum size to which the contents may be enlarged to. As a general rule this is the maximum zoom level that the screen supports without showing the horizontal scrollbar. In case horizontal scrollbar is showed, even when window is maximized, decreased this value until it disappears.
options_maxZoomAllowed_percentageExplana.description: Maximum Zoom Allowed percentage value explanation

options_minZoomAllowed_percentageExplana.message: Value used by Shrink Only and Shrink And Grow modes to specify when to stop zooming in. Use 0 for the extension to ignore this option.
options_minZoomAllowed_percentageExplana.description: Minimum Zoom Allowed percentage value explanation

options_exceptions_listUsage.message: One exception per line. Don't use commas.

options_exceptions_listExplanation.message: Exempt sites from being resized using this extension. Exceptions are checked using JavaScript Regular Expressions. If you're not familiar with them please use Tabs context menus to add exceptions automatically.

options_exemptedElements_imagesZoomIn.description: Exempt images from zooming in option description

options_exemptedElements_objectsZoomIn.message: Exclude objects (flash videos, animations, etc.) from zooming in
options_exemptedElements_objectsZoomIn.description: Exempt objects from zooming in option description

options_exemptedElements_appletsZoomIn.message: Exclude Java applets from zooming in
options_exemptedElements_appletsZoomIn.description: Exempt applets from zooming in option description

options_exemptedElements_explanation.message: Exempted elements are not affected by grow changes. Excluding any of this elements may lead to a slower performance when zooming and even poor layout arrangement so please use this options carefully. Moreover, some websites may control elements' size so this options won't work at all in those cases.
options_exemptedElements_explanation.description: Explanation of what happens when elements are exempted from zooming

popup_requireReload.description: Warns user that he/she should reload page for changes to take effect

popup_advancedOptions.description: Button to open options page through popup
